title: Deadlock Detection & Recovery
subject: Operating Systems
theory:
Let deadlock happen, then fix it.
1. **Detect**: Check Resource Allocation Graph for cycles.
2. **Recover**: Kill process (Abort) or Preempt resources.

real_world_use_cases.description: DBs allow deadlocks and then abort one transaction automatically.

exam_notes: Wait-For graph used for single instance resources.
